metadata.title: CVE-2022-48672 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:of: fdt: fix off-by-one error in unflatten_dt_nodes()Commit 78c44d910d3e ("drivers/of: Fix depth when unflattening devicetree")forgot to fix up the depth check in the loop body in unflatten_dt_nodes()which makes it possible to overflow the nps[] buffer...Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with the SVACE staticanalysis tool.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
